title: Show 224- Louise Casey
itunes:title: Show 224- Louise Casey
itunes:subtitle: Louise Casey is one of a kind. A uniquely gifted public servant, she has been a fearless champion of the most vulnerable people in society at the highest level. In this deeply personal interview, Louise recalls her experience of helping to tackle some ...
description:
Louise Casey is one of a kind. A uniquely gifted public servant, she has been a fearless champion of the most vulnerable people in society at the highest level. In this deeply personal interview, Louise recalls her experience of helping to tackle some of the UK's toughest social problems and how she's had to continually deliver uncomfortable truths to the most powerful people in the country. Louise is also hilarious and the interview is peppered with fantastic behind-the-scenes stories. 


This gripping discussion covers everything: the hard lessons Louise learned in that first role as Homelessness Czar, the scale of the social problems we face as a country and some frank personal reflections about how the tabloids wrote about her. Louise's reflections on the Rotherham paedophile scandal are particularly shocking, so be warned that the details are severe. 



 Get your tickets for the Political Party Specials at The Garrick Theatre and Vaudeville Theatre here:

 

https://www.nimaxtheatres.com/shows/matt-fordes-political-party-podcast/

 

Monday 24 May: Peter Mandelson and Sayeeda Warsi

 

Tuesday 25 May: Keir Starmer and Andrea Leadsom - SOLD OUT

 

Wednesday 2 June: Jess Phillips and Esther McVey

 

 Subscribe to British Scandal here or wherever you get your podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/british-scandal/id1563775446

 

 Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

 

Order Matt's book 'Politically Homeless' here: https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/2100000262618

 

Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde

 

Follow Matt on WTSocial: https://wt.social/u/matt-forde

 

For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
